'''''J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings Fotonovel''''' is a book which features frame blowups from the 1978 motion picture [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|The Lord of the Rings]].

==Jacket text==

Come to Middle-earth, a world beyond the furthest reaches of your imagination.

FOTONOVEL PUBLICATIONS is proud to present this glorious, animated epic now adapted into our exciting format! Over 400 full-color pictures from the actual film, J.R.R. Tolkien's "THE LORD OF THE RINGS," FOTONOVEL is perfect for Tolkien lovers everywhere!
